ResourceHeader.Description: These maps show magnetic flux emanating from the photosphere as gray coding against the sun's full latitude and Carrington longitude ranges. The maps are available once per Carrington rotation and also, from a separate subdirectory, at "daily" (more typically, once every several days) resolution. For some intervals, the data are available as both jpegs for browsing and as gzipped FITS-formatted files for quantitative work.
